function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Importation of vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and screening of travelers from endemic areas","Technologies":"Vector control methods, rapid diagnostic tests","People":"Travelers from endemic areas","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Autochthonous transmission of malaria","Impact":"Local spread of disease and potential for outbreak","Mitigation":"Implementation of vector control measures, public health education","Technologies":"Insecticide-treated bed nets, indoor residual spraying","People":"Local population in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Continued importation of malaria cases","Impact":"Persistence of malaria transmission within the country","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and screening of imported cases, vector control measures","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, insecticide-treated bed nets","People":"Health authorities, local healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
